page.title: 06 DOUGLAS LIBRARY
page.content: Douglas library opened in 1969 and it is quite modern.In the library there is an area for children.Douglas school is right next to the library and it is handy for people from the school because if they're doing a project they can go across to the library and get books to help them with it.The library is where books are given out but you must have tickets to get them out.With children's tickets you can borrow 2 books,adults can borrow 4 books.Books can be borrowed for up to 2 weeks.If you are late in handing your books back,you have to pay a fine.Some libraries have many thousands of books,and most have a reference section for looking up things.These books cannot be taken out of the library.
